nodes.text: The Vengeance was a YV-260 light freighter owned by the Rodian Bomu Clan. It was commanded by Heedron Bomu and his brother Ormann who both worked for Zonnos the Hutt. It was armed with twin pairs of ion cannons, a pair of blaster cannons and a turret-mounted tractor beam.
The ship was sent to prevent the rescue of Zonnos' brother Mika, however it failed in that mission. Ormann was killed and the rest of the crew handed over to the Corporate Sector Authority.
